Lists

A simple and very flexible sets of List. Very useful for listing different content.



Basic Setup

We listed all necessary <li> (list) to help you achieve a great looking layout. Because of it's flexibility, all the list can be styled with font-size, line-height, paddings, margins, etc.

Important!

List items is styled in default with padding and line-height.



Definition List

Definition List Title
This is a definition list division.

HTML example markup
<dl>
	<dt>Definition List Title</dt>
	<dd>This is a definition list division.</dd>
</dl>


Ordered List

Default "ordered list"


  1. List Item 1
  2. List Item 2
  3. List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ol>
	<li>List Item 1</li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ol>


Unordered List

Default <ul> styled with bullets. Bullets can be styled in whatever you desire, you can change (color, font-size, etc).

Default "unordered list"


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul>
	<li>List Item 1</li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


List No Bullets

Adding a class name ".list", will give you a simple list without (margin, padding, bullets, etc.).


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="list">
	<li><a href="#">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


Inline List

Horizontal list item, use a class name ".inline".


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="list inline">
	<li><a href="#">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


List Indention

Listing needed some indentions, so again the flexibility by adding a class name ".indent" does it.


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="list indent">
	<li><a href="#">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


List Arrow

Arrow is sometimes a substitute for bullets, a class name ".arrow" gives you another great looking layout. And the arrow can be styled to whatever you desire.


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="arrow">
	<li><a href="#">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


List Border

Listing content can also be styled by having a divider such as border. Use a class name ".border.

Important!

Since we put a border, we needed to apply a padding for better spacing.


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="list border">
	<li><a href="#">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


List with Background

Give a list a background and for more great looking layout use a class name ".with-bg". List with background should have a normal padding-left and padding-right to make the background stand really well.

For a list item to disable background just add class on a list with the name ".no-bg"

Important!

Since we put a backgorund, we needed to apply a padding for better spacing.


  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2 - Normal list with no background
  • List Item 3 - Normal list with background

HTML example markup
<ul class="list with-bg">
	<li><a href="#">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li class=""no-bg">List Item 1</a></li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


Combination List Styles

You can use and combine all styles in one declaration.



Normal List (bullets) w/ Background

  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="with-bg">
	<li><a>List Item 1 - Link</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>

List w/ Arrow, Background

  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="arrow with-bg">
	<li><a>List Item 1 - Link</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>

List w/ Arrow, Border, Background

  • List Item 1 - Link
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3

HTML example markup
<ul class="arrow border with-bg">
	<li><a>List Item 1 - Link</a></li>
	<li>List Item 2</li>
	<li>List Item 3</li>
</ul>


SASS Configuration Variables

// List Basic Styling
$list-line-height: $line-height-default !default;
$list-font-size: $font-size-default !default;
$list-color: $text-color !default;

// List Paddings
$list-padding-top: 5px !default;
$list-padding-bottom: 5px !default;
$list-padding-left: 0px !default;
$list-padding-right: 0px !default;

// List margin
$list-container-bottom: $margin-bottom-default !default;

// List Border
// List border top or bottom.
$list-border-top: none !default;
$list-border-bottom: 1px solid $color-gray !default;

// List combination of border and background
$list-border-bg-top: none !default;
$list-border-bg-bottom: 1px solid $color-white !default;

// List to display block / fluid
$list-display: normal !default;

// List Indention
$list-indent: $global-indent !default;

// List inline styling
$list-inline-margin-right: 20px !default;

// List Backgorund
// List with background - all styling
$list-bg-padding-top: $list-padding-top !default;
$list-bg-padding-bottom: $list-padding-bottom !default;
$list-bg-padding-left: 10px !default;
$list-bg-padding-right: 10px !default;

// List with background - background
$list-bg-bg: $color-gray-lighten !default;
$list-bg-bg-hover: $color-primary !default;
$list-bg-color: $color-default !default;
$list-bg-color-hover: $color-white !default;
$list-bg-bg-active: $list-bg-bg-hover !default;
$list-bg-color-active: $list-bg-color-hover !default;

// List arrow
// List arrow styling
$list-arrow-color: $color-default !default;
$list-arrow-size: 4px !default;
$list-arrow-indent: $list-bg-padding-left + $list-arrow-size - 1 !default;
$list-arrow-position-top: $list-padding-top + $list-arrow-size + 2 !default;

// List Bullet
// List bullet styling
$list-bullet-color: $color-primary !default;
$list-bullet-font-size: 18px !default;
$list-bullet-line-height: 1.25 !default;
$list-bullet-padding-left: $list-bg-padding-left !default;
$list-bullet-position-top: $list-padding-top !default;

// List Bullet
// List bullet styling
$list-bullet-color: $color-primary !default;
$list-bullet-font-size: 18px !default;
$list-bullet-line-height: 1.25 !default;
$list-bullet-padding-left: $list-bg-padding-left !default;
$list-bullet-position-top: $list-padding-top !default;

// Definition List
// Definition List -Basic styling
$dt-font-weight: bold !default;
$dt-font-size: $font-size-default !default; 
$dt-dd-margin-bottom: 10px !default;
$dt-color: $color-default !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
